log.content: I would like you to create an svg image of a sunset through the mountains. Make sure the result is visible in index.html

function.name: create_file
function.arguments:
{"content":"<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Sunset Through Mountains</title>
</head>
<body>
    <svg width="800" height="600">
        <defs>
            <linearGradient id="sunset" x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="1">
                <stop offset="0%" stop-color="orange"/>
                <stop offset="100%" stop-color="purple"/>
            </linearGradient>
        </defs>
        <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="url(#sunset)" />
        <!-- Mountains -->
        <polygon points="0,400 200,300 400,400" fill="#555"/>
        <polygon points="200,350 300,250 400,350" fill="#777"/>
        <polygon points="300,300 400,200 500,300" fill="#999"/>
        <!-- Sun -->
        <circle cx="100" cy="100" r="50" fill="yellow"/>
    </svg>
</body>
</html>","file_name":"index.html"}
